tool_description: This API can be used to get the current price of gold, silver, platinum, and palladium in US dollars per troy ounce.
name: Current Precious Metal Price
title: Current Precious Metal Price

api_list.name: GetMetalPrice
api_list.description: Gets the current price for a precious metals such as gold, silver, platinum, palladium, rhodium, and iridium.

required_parameters.name: metal
required_parameters.description: The metals corresponding integer. (Gold = 0, Silver = 1, Platinum = 3, Palladium = 4)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-precious-metal-price.p.rapidapi.com/metals/v1/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-precious-metal-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-precious-metal-price.p.rapidapi.com/metals/v1/{metal}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-precious-metal-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
